hero.title.1: Power Your Business by Green Energy !
hero.header.1: It's coming here! Asia's most straightforward carbon trading platform.

products.title: Our Products
products.contents1:
With just a few clicks, everyone can be a tutor.

 No matter if you're a student, teacher, professional, or retired. 
Someone out there wants to learn something from you.
products.contents2: From language, science, art, to life skills
products.contents3:
MeinSherpa is free. 
 We are building a community of learners. We took nothing from you.
footer.intro: Taiwan Carbon Exchange provides carbon trade platforms and education for carbon certification.
